mapper.insert: insert into Board(board_no,content,title, regdate, leaguename, member_no, filename) values((select nvl(max(board_no),0)+1 as board_no from BOARD),#{content},#{title},sysdate,#{leagueName},#{member_no}, #{fileName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rn, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC) A WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rn >= #{startRowNo}
